> [!CAUTION]
> The module is not yet fit for public use.

## Custom Conditions for PF1e

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/17273782/488575022-b91df64d-11cb-472c-b2bf-b760fa1dd2ee.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Tq6s9Z6X52wLj37cvoiupV2LVhPWQKOOOXfJ7juy-kg)

This module lets you add or remove conditions and custom buffs to tokens you don't own. It's really quite useful.

[Check the wiki page for more info](https://github.com/LumosX/FVTT-Custom-Conditions-for-PF1e/wiki)

* Allows players to affect any targetable tokens with status conditions and custom buffs (provided a GM is present)
* Supports custom condition buff items with levels and durations
* Can override levels and durations on the fly, letting you reapply conditions, or worsen or ameliorate them on specific targets


Based on the convenient [TyphonJS FVTT Runtime](https://github.com/typhonjs-fvtt-lib/runtime) library.
